head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOLD, JOSEPH G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOLD, JOSEPH G.

block.p: HOLD-Joseph G. Of Pearl River, New York, died on April 29, 2000. Born on July 31, 1937 in Laibach, Yugoslavia to Joseph and Ottilie Hoegler Hold. Education includes graduate studies in Literature at City University, NYC, Bachelor's Degree in English from Manhattan College, Riverdale, NY 1959, & a graduate of LaSalle Academy, Manhattan. Married Collette Skeffington at St. Joan of Arc Parish, Jackson Heights, Queens, December 7, 1968. Was an Associate Managing Editor for Family Circle Magazine in New York City for over 20 years. Beloved husband of Collette. Devoted father of Gregory F. of Jersey City, NJ and Steven J. of Warren, NJ. Loving father-inlaw of Amy Hold of Warren, NJ. Mass on Wednesday, 10 AM, St. Margaret's Church, Pearl River, NY. Burial St. Anthony's Cemetery, Nanuet, NY. Visiting Monday, 7-9 PM, and Tuesday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. Memorial donations may be made in memory of Joseph G. Hold to American Cancer Society, 1 Executive Blvd., Suite 206, Suffern, NY 10901. For information contact Assumma - Shankey Funeral Home, 914-735-4849.
